subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Ellsbury, a left-handed center fielder of Native American descent who looks and plays like a younger, faster Johnny Damon, has started off his year by hitting .452 at Portland.
snippet: Jacoby Ellsbury, a left-handed center fielder of Native American descent who looks and plays like a younger, faster Johnny Damon, has started off his year by hitting .452 at Portland.
